q: LONDON( Reuters)-`` The X Factor,'' which has a U.S. launch this year, won the talent show category at the National Television Awards on Wednesday, beating Britain's Got Talent, `` Dancing on Ice'' and`` Strictly Come Dancing.'' The prime minister's communications chief Andy Coulson has resigned, blaming coverage of the News of the World phone hacking scandal. Mr Andy Coulson said coverage had made it difficult for me to give the 110% needed in this role . He faced pressure after claims about phone hacking while he was editor.

David Cameron I am very sorry that Andy Coulson has decided to resign as my Director of Communications, although I understand that the continuing pressures on him and his family mean that he feels compelled to do so. Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the Government. `` During his time working for me, Andy Coulson has carried out his role with complete professionalism.
